description:
### Context & Content

Information is from this [NYTimes article](https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2020/us/coronavirus-stay-at-home-order.html?campaign_id=9&emc=edit_NN_p_20200330&instance_id=17179&nl=morning-briefing®i_id=119872245§ion=topNews&segment_id=23277&te=1&user_id=6b58b317b2131c915de58a4774fe51a9). 

Date of when is each state / county's stay-at-home order becomes effective as a result of the covid-19 pandemic. This dataset is updated daily as more states & counties issue stay-at-home order. 

Currently there are at least 42 states with orders to stay home. Last updated on Apr 07, 2020.

### See Data in Action

I have built a covid-19 tracking dashboard using this & other datasets [here](http://sloth.shinyapps.io/covid19/). This dashboard is updated daily. All feedback is welcome!

### Column Description
* `Country` - country 
* `State` - state
* `County` - county is "" if the stay-at-home order is effective state-wide; otherwise county shows the counties/regions in that state with stay at home orders.
* `Date` - date of when the stay-at-home order becomes effective
* `Type` - type of the stay-at-home order

### Acknowledgements

* This [NYTimes article](https://www.nytimes.com/interactive/2020/us/coronavirus-stay-at-home-order.html?campaign_id=9&emc=edit_NN_p_20200330&instance_id=17179&nl=morning-briefing®i_id=119872245§ion=topNews&segment_id=23277&te=1&user_id=6b58b317b2131c915de58a4774fe51a9) for making the information available
title: Covid19 US Lockdown Dates Dataset
